about_the_game: The 'Rock of Ages 3 Original Soundtrack' features fully remastered versions of the music included in the game. The OST delivers two variations of the music; one list with rock arrangements and a second list with symphonic/orchestrated arrangements.
detailed_description: The 'Rock of Ages 3 Original Soundtrack' features fully remastered versions of the music included in the game. The OST delivers two variations of the music; one list with rock arrangements and a second list with symphonic/orchestrated arrangements.
